fields.name: add-identifier
fields.description: Add a new identifier for the patient.
fields.note:
• Must not contain the assigner and use fields.
  • Must contain the type, system and value fields, and must include a time component with a timezone when specifying a period.

fields.name: test-identifier-id
fields.description: Test the value of the Identifier.id of the identifier at the given {index} in the list of patient identifiers.

fields.name: remove-identifier
fields.description: Remove the identifier at the given {index} in the list of patient identifiers.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the Identifier.id of the identifier intended to be removed.

fields.name: replace-identifier-system
fields.description: Replace the Identifier.system of the identifier at the given {index} in the list of patient identifiers.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the Identifier.id of the identifier whose system is intended to be replaced.

fields.name: replace-identifier-value
fields.description: Replace the Identifier.value of the identifier at the given {index} in the list of patient identifiers.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the Identifier.id of the identifier whose value is intended to be replaced.

fields.name: replace-identifier-period
fields.description: Replace the Identifier.period of the identifier at the given {index} in the list of patient identifiers.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the Identifier.id of the identifier whose period is intended to be replaced.
  • The start and end when provided must include a time component with a timezone.
  • When either start or end are not provided its value will be unset.

fields.name: test-name-id
fields.description: Test the value of the HumanName.id of the name at the given {index} in the list of patient names.
fields.note: • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of patient names ({index} == 0).

fields.name: replace-name-family
fields.description: Replace the HumanName.family of the name at the given {index} in the list of patient names.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the HumanName.id of the name whose family is intended to be replaced.
  • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of patient names ({index} == 0).

fields.name: replace-name-given
fields.description: Replace the HumanName.given of the name at the given {index} in the list of patient names.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the HumanName.id of the name whose given is intended to be replaced.
  • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of patient names ({index} == 0).
  • If fewer values for given are provided in the list than previously set, the additional older values will be unset.

fields.name: replace-name-prefix
fields.description: Replace the HumanName.prefix of the name at the given {index} in the list of patient names.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the HumanName.id of the name whose prefix is intended to be replaced.
  • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of patient names ({index} == 0).
  • If no prefix value is provided the prefix on the name will be unset.

fields.name: replace-name-suffix
fields.description: Replace the HumanName.suffix of the name at the given {index} in the list of patient names.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the HumanName.id of the name whose suffix is intended to be replaced.
  • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of patient names ({index} == 0).
  • If no suffix value is provided the suffix on the name will be unset.

fields.name: replace-name-period
fields.description: Replace the HumanName.period of the name at the given {index} in the list of patient names.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the HumanName.id of the name whose period is intended to be replaced.
  • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of patient names ({index} == 0).
  • Must not contain the end field.
  • The start must include a time component with a timezone.

fields.name: add-telecom
fields.description: Add a new contact detail for the patient.
fields.note: • Must contain the system, use and value fields, and must include a time component with a timezone when specifying a period.

fields.name: test-telecom-id
fields.description: Test the value of the ContactPoint.id of the telecom at the given {index} in the list of patient telecoms.

fields.name: remove-telecom
fields.description: Remove the telecom at the given {index} in the list of patient telecoms.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the ContactPoint.id of the telecom intended to be removed.

fields.name: replace-telecom-value
fields.description: Replace the ContactPoint.value of the telecom at the given {index} in the list of patient telecoms.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the ContactPoint.id of the telecom whose value is intended to be replaced.

fields.name: replace-telecom-rank
fields.description: Replace the ContactPoint.rank of the telecom at the given {index} in the list of patient telecoms.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the ContactPoint.id of the telecom whose rank is intended to be replaced.

fields.name: replace-telecom-extension
fields.description: Replaces the phone extension of the telecom at the given {index} in the list of patient telecoms.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the ContactPoint.id of the telecom whose extension value is intended to be replaced.
  • The system field of the telecom whose extension is intended to be replaced must be 'phone'.
  • If no valueString is provided, the phone extension will be unset.
  • The url must be 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/contactpoint-extension'.

fields.name: replace-telecom-period
fields.description: Replace the ContactPoint.period of the telecom at the given {index} in the list of patient telecoms.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the ContactPoint.id of the telecom whose period is intended to be replaced.
  • The start and end when provided must include a time component with a timezone.
  • When either start or end are not provided its value will be unset.

fields.name: replace-gender
fields.description: Replace the gender that the patient is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

fields.name: replace-birth-date
fields.description: Replace the date of birth for the individual.

fields.name: add-address
fields.description: Add a new address for the patient.
fields.note:
• Must not contain the text field.
  • Must contain the use field, and must include a time component with a timezone when specifying a period.

fields.name: test-address-id
fields.description: Test the value of the Address.id of the address at the given {index} in the list of patient addresses.

fields.name: remove-address
fields.description: Remove the address at the given {index} in the list of patient addresses.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the Address.id of the address intended to be removed.

fields.name: replace-address-line
fields.description: Replace the Address.line of the address at the given {index} in the list of patient addresses.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the Address.id of the address whose line is intended to be replaced.
  • If no line is provided, all the lines on the address will be unset.
  • If fewer values for line are provided in the list than previously set, the additional older values will be unset.

fields.name: replace-address-city
fields.description: Replace the Address.city of the address at the given {index} in the list of patient addresses.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the Address.id of the address whose city is intended to be replaced.
  • If no city is provided, the city on the address will be unset.

fields.name: replace-address-district
fields.description: Replace the Address.district of the address at the given {index} in the list of patient addresses.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the Address.id of the address whose district is intended to be replaced.
  • If no district is provided, the district on the address will be unset.

fields.name: replace-address-state
fields.description: Replace the Address.state of the address at the given {index} in the list of patient addresses.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the Address.id of the address whose state is intended to be replaced.
  • If no state is provided, the state on the address will be unset.

fields.name: replace-address-postal-code
fields.description: Replace the Address.postalCode of the address at the given {index} in the list of patient addresses.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the Address.id of the address whose postalCode is intended to be replaced.
  • If no postalCode is provided, the postalCode on the address will be unset.

fields.name: replace-address-country
fields.description: Replace the Address.country of the address at the given {index} in the list of patient addresses.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the Address.id of the address whose country is intended to be replaced.
  • If no country is provided, the country on the address will be unset.

fields.name: replace-address-period
fields.description: Replace the Address.period of the address at the given {index} in the list of patient addresses.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the Address.id of the address whose period is intended to be replaced.
  • The start and end when provided must include a time component with a timezone.
  • When either start or end are not provided its value will be unset.

fields.name: replace-marital-status
fields.description: Replace the patient's most recent marital (civil) status.

fields.name: replace-communication
fields.description: Replace the language which may be used to communicate with the patient about his health.
fields.note: • Patient.communication value should a list with only a single element.

fields.name: add-general-practitioner
fields.description: Add a new nominated care provider.
fields.note: • Must be a reference to a Practitioner.

fields.name: test-general-practitioner-id
fields.description: Test the value of the Reference.id of the general practitioner at the given {index} in the list of the patient's nominated care providers.

fields.name: remove-general-practitioner
fields.description: Remove the general practitoner at the given {index} in the list of the patient's nominated care providers.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the Reference.id of the general practitioner intended to be removed.

fields.name: replace-extension
fields.description: Replace the value of an extension that adds additional information about the patient.
fields.note:
Supported extensions that can be replaced:
  • US Core Birth Sex
  • US Core Race
  • US Core Ethnicity

fields.name: test-communication-preference-id
fields.description: Test the value of the CommunicationPreference.id of the Communication Preference at the given {index} in the list of the patient's extensions.

fields.name: remove-communication-preference-id
fields.description: Remove the CommunicationPreference at the given {index} in the list of the patient's extensions.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the CommunicationPreference.id of the Communication Preference intended to be removed.

fields.name: add-communication-preference
fields.description: Add a new Communication Preference extension for the patient.
fields.note: • Must be a valid CommunicationPreference extension.

fields.name: replace-communication-preference-id
fields.description: Replace the CommunicationPreference at the given {index} in the list of the patient's extensions. At a time only one communication Preference can be changed.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the CommunicationPreference.id of the Communication Preference intended to be removed.
  • Test operation path and replace extension path index should be same.
